1.title: Katie's Story

episode of.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (TV Mini-Series 2015)

1.plot: Explores the life of a young mum trying to overcome a difficult past and build a brighter future for herself and her child as she battles her way through depression and difficult relationships.

2.title: Abby's Story

episode of.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (TV Mini-Series 2015)

2.plot: Recounts her experience of falling into severe depression in pregnancy and after the birth of her daughter, and her journey back towards a happy and fulfilled motherhood.

3.title: Tiff's Story

episode of.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (TV Mini-Series 2015)

3.plot: Conveys something of the feelings that she experienced whilst suffering from perinatal depression, and tells her story of how she made it out the other side.

4.title: Andrea's Story

episode of.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (TV Mini-Series 2015)

4.plot: Captures her experience of postpartum psychosis; a descent from the joy of a new baby into terror, confusion, euphoria and the long road back from deep depression.

5.title: Mike's Story

episode of.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (TV Mini-Series 2015)

5.plot: Explores the challenge of watching your partner transform into a different person, overcome with anxiety. How do you support your wife, hold down a job and look after your newborn baby as all sense of normality collapses around you?

imdb.title: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression
akas: Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression (United Kingdom)
plot: _Animated Minds: Stories of Postnatal Depression_ (qv) is a series of 5 films highlighting personal stories of perinatal mental health issues. Animation is combined with personal testimony to give honesty and power to the narratives of 5 parents.
